questions.text: Who plays Michael Scott?
questions.explanation: Steve Carell played the bumbling regional manager Michael Scott for seven seasons.

questions.text: What paper company is featured in The Office?
questions.explanation: Dunder Mifflin Paper Company is the workplace where the show takes place.

questions.text: What city is the Scranton branch located in?
questions.explanation: The show is set in Scranton, Pennsylvania, though it was filmed in California.

questions.text: Who does Jim Halpert marry?
questions.explanation: Jim and Pam's relationship is the emotional core of the series, and they marry in Season 6.

questions.text: What is Dwight Schrute's title?
questions.explanation: Dwight's made-up title is 'Assistant TO the Regional Manager,' much to his chagrin.

questions.text: What does Dwight grow on his family farm?
questions.explanation: Dwight owns and operates Schrute Farms, a beet farm and bed & breakfast.

questions.text: What is the name of Michael Scott's alter ego?
questions.explanation: Michael has many alter egos including Prison Mike, Date Mike, and Blind Guy McSqueezy.

questions.text: Who is the HR representative everyone dislikes?
questions.explanation: Toby Flenderson is the HR rep whom Michael especially despises.

questions.text: What is the name of the receptionist before Pam?

options.A: There was no receptionist before Pam

questions.explanation: Pam is the receptionist from the beginning, though Erin later replaces her when she moves to sales.

questions.text: What does Kevin spill on the floor in Season 5?
questions.explanation: Kevin's famous chili spilling is one of the show's most memorable cold opens.

questions.text: Who becomes regional manager after Michael leaves?
questions.explanation: Andy Bernard becomes regional manager in Season 8, though the position changes hands multiple times.

questions.text: What is Angela's favorite type of animal?
questions.explanation: Angela Martin is obsessed with cats and is a member of the Party Planning Committee.

questions.text: What does Michael burn his foot on?
questions.explanation: Michael burns his foot on a George Foreman Grill that he uses to cook bacon by his bed.

questions.text: Who does Andy date before Angela?
questions.explanation: Andy dated Angela, who was secretly also seeing Dwight, creating a love triangle.

questions.text: What is the name of Pam and Jim's first child?
questions.explanation: Their daughter Cecelia (Cece) Halpert is born in Season 6.

questions.text: What is Creed's job at Dunder Mifflin?
questions.explanation: Creed works in Quality Assurance, though he's clearly not very good at it.

questions.text: What does Jim put Dwight's stapler in?
questions.explanation: In the pilot episode, Jim puts Dwight's stapler in Jello, one of his many pranks.

questions.text: What is Michael's movie idea called?
questions.explanation: Threat Level Midnight is Michael's amateur action film featuring his character Michael Scarn.

questions.text: Who does Kelly Kapoor have an on-again, off-again relationship with?
questions.explanation: Kelly and Ryan have a toxic, dramatic relationship throughout the series.

questions.text: What is Phyllis's husband's name?
questions.explanation: Bob Vance, of Vance Refrigeration, is Phyllis's husband.

questions.text: What does Michael hit with his car?
questions.explanation: Michael hits Meredith with his car in the Season 4 premiere, 'Fun Run.'

questions.text: What prize does Dwight win at the Dundies?
questions.explanation: Dwight wins the 'Bushiest Beaver' award for his exceptional work ethic.

questions.text: Where did Jim and Pam get married?
questions.explanation: Jim and Pam got married at Niagara Falls in the Season 6 episode 'Niagara.'

questions.text: What is Stanley's favorite day?
questions.explanation: Stanley loves Pretzel Day, as shown in the episode '99.'

questions.text: Who is the Scranton Strangler?
questions.explanation: The true identity of the Scranton Strangler is never definitively revealed, though theories abound.

questions.text: What does Michael propose to Holly with?
questions.explanation: Michael uses a candlestick to propose to Holly during a Diwali celebration.

questions.text: What is the name of the senator Angela marries?
questions.explanation: Angela marries State Senator Robert Lipton, who is later revealed to be gay.

questions.text: What sport does Jim create in the office?
questions.explanation: Flonkerton is a box-walking race created during the Office Olympics.

questions.text: Who replaces Pam as receptionist?
questions.explanation: Erin Hannon becomes the receptionist when Pam moves to sales.

questions.text: What is the name of the warehouse worker who dates Pam?
questions.explanation: Roy Anderson is Pam's fianc√© at the start of the series before she breaks it off for Jim.

questions.text: What does Dwight keep in his desk?
questions.explanation: Dwight keeps an arsenal of weapons in his desk, revealed in various episodes.

questions.text: What is the name of Michael's improv class?

options.C: The Michael Scott School of Acting

questions.explanation: Michael takes an improv class where he learns the 'Yes, And' technique.

questions.text: Who becomes CEO of Dunder Mifflin?
questions.explanation: Robert California manipulates his way into becoming CEO in Season 8.

questions.text: What is the name of Jim's sports marketing company?
questions.explanation: The company is renamed from Athlead to Athleap partway through Season 9.

questions.text: What does Oscar win a Dundie for?
questions.explanation: Oscar wins the 'Actually' award for frequently correcting people.

questions.text: What game does Jim invent to mess with Dwight?
questions.explanation: Jim conditions Dwight to want an Altoid every time the computer makes a sound.

questions.text: Where does Michael move at the end of Season 7?
questions.explanation: Michael moves to Boulder, Colorado to be with Holly.

questions.text: What is the name of Andy's a cappella group?
questions.explanation: Andy was in Cornell's a cappella group 'Here Comes Treble.'

questions.text: What does Dwight raise the thermostat to?
questions.explanation: Dwight raises the thermostat to 82 degrees, causing the office to overheat.

questions.text: What is Kevin's band called?
questions.explanation: Kevin plays in a Police cover band called Scrantonicity.

questions.text: Who steals all of Jim's clients?
questions.explanation: Danny Cordray, played by Timothy Olyphant, is a rival salesman who steals Jim's clients.

questions.text: What does Michael call his condo?
questions.explanation: Michael refers to his condo as his 'Fortress of Solitude.'

questions.text: Who wins the bronze medal in the Office Olympics?
questions.explanation: Phyllis wins the bronze medal during the Office Olympics episode.

questions.text: What does Michael grill his foot on while making breakfast?
questions.explanation: Michael is cooking bacon on his bedside George Foreman Grill when he burns his foot.

questions.text: Who does Ryan date briefly?
questions.explanation: Ryan dated Kelly throughout, briefly pursued Pam, and dated Erin in Season 9.

questions.text: What is the name of Jan's assistant?
questions.explanation: Hunter is Jan's young assistant whom she had an affair with.

questions.text: What charity does Michael donate a giant check to?
questions.explanation: Michael promises to pay for college tuition for a class of third-graders in 'Scott's Tots.'

questions.text: What does Pam fail at art school?
questions.explanation: Pam fails a design course and chooses to leave art school in New York.

questions.text: Who becomes the father of Angela's baby?
questions.explanation: Dwight is revealed to be the father of Angela's son, Philip.

questions.text: What is the name of the documentary crew member?
questions.explanation: Brian, the boom mic operator, becomes involved with Pam in Season 9.

questions.text: What does Michael do at Phyllis's wedding?
questions.explanation: Michael inserts himself into Phyllis's wedding in multiple inappropriate ways.

questions.text: What does Dwight gift Angela?
questions.explanation: Dwight gives Angela various strange gifts including a dead goose and a cat.

questions.text: Who returns as a surprise in the finale?
questions.explanation: Michael Scott returns as Dwight's best man in the series finale.

questions.text: What does Creed do when he becomes manager?
questions.explanation: When Creed briefly becomes manager, he does cartwheels in celebration.

questions.text: What is Meredith's addiction?
questions.explanation: Meredith struggles with alcoholism throughout the series.

questions.text: Who does Andy go on a boat trip with?
questions.explanation: Andy goes on a boat trip with his father, which tanks his relationship with Erin.

questions.text: What is the name of Robert California's wife?
questions.explanation: Susan California briefly works at Dunder Mifflin in Season 8.

questions.text: What does Jim wear to impersonate Dwight?
questions.explanation: Jim perfectly impersonates Dwight with glasses and a mustard-colored shirt.

questions.text: How many years did the documentary take to film?
questions.explanation: The documentary crew filmed for nine years, as revealed in Season 9.

questions.text: What are Pam's last words in the series?

options.B: There's a lot of beauty in ordinary things

questions.explanation: Pam's final talking head reflects on finding beauty in ordinary things, the show's central theme.
